loggcomp module:¶

Routines for looking at comparison of ASPCAP log g with asteroseismic and/or physical gravity estimates

holtz.apogee.loggcomp.apokasc(allstar, logg='LOGG_SYD_SCALING', apokasc='APOKASC_cat_v3.6.0.fits', raw=True, cal=True)[source]¶

asteroseismic log g comparisons for input allStar structure

holtz.apogee.loggcomp.clusters(allstar, xr=[-2.75, 0.5], yr=[-1.0, 1.0], zr=[3500, 5500], apokasc='APOKASC_cat_v3.6.0.fits', firstgen=False)[source]¶

Compare ASPCAP gravities in clusters to physical gravities
